=== Basic meetings ===
The beginning steps of Ubuntu-be.org can be found in 3 basic meetings:
* <nowiki>[[BelgianTeam-2008kickoff]]</nowiki> 2008-01-06: 2008 kickoff meeting

* <nowiki>[[BelgianTeam-PastMeetings-Leuven_2007-01-06]]</nowiki>: report of the Ubuntu working summit  (<nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-be/2006-December/001662.html|announcement]]</nowiki>)

* <nowiki>[[BelgianTeam-PastMeetings-Vilvoorde_2011-04-25 | Report of the meeting "Laying some fundation" Vilvoorde 25-04-2011]]</nowiki> 

=== Regular meetings ===
On nearly weekly basis, there is an IRC meeting with Ubuntu-be members. Reports and logs can be found on the specific page. The upcoming agenda is on the <nowiki>[[BelgianTeam-IrcMeetings-| main IrcMeetings page]]</nowiki>.
* <nowiki>[[BelgianTeam-IrcMeetings-Logs | Logs]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[BelgianTeam-IrcMeetings-Reports | Reports]]</nowiki>
